text: Tune in at 11 am ET as House and Senate Democrats come together to call for action on the #ForThePeople Act, one year after the House passed this crucial legislation. https://facebook.com/nancypelosi

RT @RepBera America’s state & local health agencies are essential in fighting #coronavirus.

To help them keep up the fight, our emergency response package included $1 billion to help alleviate their costs from fighting this disease. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ESwI0L1WAAEqFme.jpg

Paid sick leave in the middle of a public health crisis shouldn't be a luxury that only some can afford. I've joined my colleagues on a bill to require all employers in America to provide paid sick leave.

Today, I’m proud to join @RepUnderwood, @SenKamalaHarris, and the @BMHCaucus to make a historic announcement about our work to solve this crisis.

#Momnibus
#BlackMomsMatter

At a time when Democrats correctly attack Republicans for voter suppression, to see voters standing in long lines for hours in Michigan and around America is an outrage. Election officials must address these problems immediately, and if necessary, keep polling places open longer.

#COVID19 is NOT part of a conspiracy to hurt the President. It is a real threat that will disrupt our economy & our daily lives. 

But at a time when we need people to believe truth the media is undermining its credibility with many by covering this as a partisan political issue.
Every worker in America should have guaranteed paid sick leave. This is already the case in every other major country on Earth.

WATCH the below video on preventative steps you can take to reduce the spread of #coronavirus at home and at work. 👇
 
For more information, visit https://cdc.gov/COVID19.

Hoy la administración del presidente uruguayo @LuisLacallePou ha tomado un importante paso al abandonar @unasur y suspender el proceso de salida de #Uruguay del Tratado Interamericano de Asistencia Recíproca (TIAR). https://twitter.com/efenoticias/status/1237463673096089602 QT @EFEnoticias "El Gobierno del Uruguay dispuso retirarse de la Unasur, que ya ha sido abandonado por la mayoría de los países de la región a excepción de Guyana, Surinam y Venezuela", señala un comunicado emitido por el Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores https://www.efe.com/efe/america/politica/uruguay-se-retira-de-la-unasur-y-retorna-al-tiar/20000035-4192736

RT @SenMikeLee Even where the House FISA / PATRIOT Act deal claims to offer modest protection for political candidates and elected officials, it doesn’t provide the same protection for the American people!  @realDonaldTrump has asked for real FISA reforms, not fake ones. Sad!

RT @hcphtx 🧼 Wash your hands often with soap& water for at least 20s, especially after going to bathroom; before eating &after blowing your nose, coughing/sneezing. 
If soap &water are not readily available, use alcohol-based hand sanitizer with at least 60% alcohol. #COVID19 #coronavirus https://twitter.com/hhsgov/status/1237362862781235200 QT @HHSGov To protect yourself from #COVIID19, avoid being exposed to the virus and use everyday prevention action to prevent the spread of respiratory virus: 
1️⃣  Cover your cough
2️⃣  Wash your hands
3️⃣  Stay home when sick
More at: https://www.cdc.gov/coronavirus/2019-ncov/about/prevention-treatment.html?utm_source=TWITTER&utm_medium=TWITTER&utm_content=100001174051678&utm_campaign=Short+to+Mid-Term&linkId=100000011090828 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ESv-9KYWsAApgDJ.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1237362767558033409/pu/vid/480x270/XD_dhgBlT7dONp72.mp4?tag=10

How insane is this? We tell young people to get the best education they can, and then saddle them for decades with crushing loan debt.

It is not a "radical idea" to tax Wall Street, make public colleges and universities tuition-free, and cancel $1.7 trillion in student debt.

We are living in such dangerous times that safety is something we all have to earn together - by being active participants in bold transformations like Medicare For All + a #GreenNewDeal.

No shortcuts. #BernieSurge

I remain committed to fixing the regulatory system that led us here and am continuing to work with agencies and industry to uncover all the relevant facts and work toward the right solution. Above all, the safety of the flying public is, and must remain, our top priority.

President Trump’s inaccurate, politicized, & rambling Friday press conference on coronavirus was a disservice to our public health officials & our nation. @SenMarkey & I raised our concerns with @VP Pence & asked him to clarify the President’s comments. https://www.warren.senate.gov/oversight/letters/warren-markey-press-pence-for-answers-following-trumps-rambling-coronavirus-press-conference-at-cdc http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ESxEov7XkAMeIWk.png http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ESxEqT7WsAAD1Po.png http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ESxEr8_WkAAAnd5.png http://pbs.twimg.com/media/ESxEtfNXYAYAxLa.png

We are all in this together. We need Medicare for All.

Sara Fearrington works double shifts, $7.40 an hour, no vacations, $28.42 in savings, facing eviction.

53 million low-wage workers like her are struggling on $18,000 a year.

We need a $15 minimum wage and unions to guarantee a dignified life in America. https://www.washingtonpost.com/nation/2020/03/08/living-without-living-wage/

It’s outrageous the Trump administration is obstructing her from being on the $20 bill.

Our teachers should be the best-paid in the industrialized world, not among the worst-paid.

One year later, I'm still heartbroken for the families of the men, women & children who lost their lives aboard ET 302. Over the last year we've learned a lot about what led to this tragedy & unfortunately many initial concerns have been confirmed. These deaths were preventable.
